column4: Google's Android software in 3 out of 4 smartphones

column4: Sandy caused "major damage" to U.N. headquarters: official

column5: Nov 2 - Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A' rating to Verizon Communications  Inc.'s  (Verizon) (NYSE: VZ) proposed three tranche offering of $4.5 billion of senior unsecured notes. The proceeds will be used to retire prior to maturity all or a portion of $1.75 billion of debt due in 2013  $2 billion of debt due in 2018 and to fund a tender offer  contingent upon completing the offering  for any or all of the $1.25 billion 8.95% senior unsecured notes due in 2039. column4: Verizon sees "significant" impact from Sandy on fourth-quarter results
column5: Verizon Communications Inc  said it expected fourth-quarter results to be hurt significantly due to superstorm Sandy and that it could not estimate the impact at this time.

column4: Verizon sees "significant" impact from Sandy on 4th-qtr results
column5: Nov 2 Verizon Communications Inc said it expected fourth-quarter results to be hurt significantly due to superstorm Sandy and that it could not estimate the impact at this time.

column4: BRIEF-Vornado Realty to continue to sell assets in 2013
column5: Nov 2 Vornado Realty Trust :  * CEO says sees continuing to sell assets in 2013  * CEO about $400-$500 million in non core assets in sale pipeline  * Sees Manhattan office rent in 2013 about flat  * Chairman says of co's stake in J C Penney Company Inc  we remain

column4: UPDATE 2-Wipro profit  margins top expectations; shares up
column5: * Q2 net profit at 16.11 bln rupees vs 15.37 bln estimates

column4: Wipro Q2 profit rises 24 percent  beats estimates
column5: BANGALORE  Nov 2 Wipro Ltd.  India's No. 3 software services provider  beat forecasts with a 24 percent rise in quarterly profit  helped by a surge in outsourcing demand as Western clients look to cut costs in an uncertain economic environment.
